message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations or personal endeavors. Given its unique features and high quality, I am confident it will be of great value to you. I am offering this exceptional item for $15000. Please let me know if you have any questions or need more information about the product.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10000. I believe that's a fair price considering the features and quality you've described. Can you consider my offer?

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I appreciate your feedback and understand your perspective on the pricing. However, due to the high demand and unique value proposition of this product, we are unable to accept the counteroffer at this time. We are willing to negotiate further, so please consider our revised offer of $12000 for the product.

Thank you for considering my previous offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $11500 for the product. Can you consider this revised offer?

Thank you for your continued interest in our product, Bob. I understand your position and am willing to make a compromise. Considering the unique features and value of the product, I propose an offer of $11250 for the product. This represents a midpoint between our previous offers, aiming to satisfy both parties. Please let me know if this proposal works for you.
